|blank1_info = 1267470 |website = |footnotes = }} Marion is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Turner County, and 849 people lived there at the 2020 census. Marion became a city in 1881. ==References== Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1881 establishments in Dakota Territory
